content:
Given the set of words, come up with a poem within 80 words.
ocean, blue, feel, bubbles

In the vast ocean, so deep and blue,  
Whispers of waves speak softly to you.  
Feel the gentle touch of the sea's embrace,  
As bubbles rise, dancing with grace.  

Under the sky, endless and wide,  
Dreams sail freely with the tide.  
In the ocean's heart, secrets keep,  
Where the world above and below meet.  

Blue horizons stretch afar,  
Guiding sailors by the stars.  
In the ocean's lullaby, find your peace,  
Where the dance of bubbles shall never cease.
